Name: Lilian Aydee
description:
She lives with her family. She works in agriculture as her principal source of income. She grows coffee of good quality because she provides adequate care, to later be able to sell at an excellent price. She is very responsible with her crops; she likes to give excellent maintenance.

She requests the loan to buy fertilizers and mulch for her crops and so to have very good production. She is very pleased with the kindness and good treatment received from Prisma and Kiva. She is very grateful for the support received.

Her dream is to have good production.

May 2023.
